column4: Using latest X.org and latest fglrx. Complaints in dmesg output about missing map. Only problem in Xorg.0.log is that it takes several retries to get to the device. What do I do from here to get hardware 3D acceleration working?
you're using ubuntu fglrx packages?  Or by "latest", do you mean you installed something from ATI's website?
I'm using the ubuntu. I figured those would work better. Should I use from ati's site
